title: Emerald Dream Jhumkaalu: A Timeless Heritage
materials: studded with sparkling white cubic zirconia and vibrant green emerald-colored stones. Lustrous simulated pearl drops. Features Hyderabadi polish for lasting shine and durability.
features: Classic Jhumka design with floral motifs embellished with CZ stones and emerald-colored stones, leading to a bell-shaped Jhumka with intricate lattice detailing. The pearl drop adds a touch of elegance. Inspired by traditional temple jewelry craftsmanship.
colors: Predominantly gold with white cubic zirconia accents
highlighted by the rich green of the emerald-colored stones and the soft white of the pearls.
occasions: and special occasions like half-saree functions (Langa Voni celebrations). Also suitable for adding a touch of traditional elegance to contemporary outfits.
description: This exquisite pair of Jhumkaalu perfectly blends traditional South Indian design with modern elegance. The superior Hyderabadi polish ensures longevity, while the emerald-colored stones and pearl drops enhance its beauty and make it a timeless addition to your jewelry collection. A statement piece showcasing the heritage and craftsmanship of Hyderabad.
